text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, az cizhoe napursed, ki agar [posuxi haqiqias] ʙarojaton oskor gardad, anduhginaton mekunad va agar zamone, ki Qur'on nozil megardad, pursucu kuned, [hukmu posuxi pursishojaton] ʙar sumo oskor megardad. Alloh taolo az on [masoil va ʙajoni onho] darguzast va Alloh taolo omurzandai ʙurdʙor ast
